sentence.Network_en: The newcomer did no more than smile shamefacedly, but it was sufficient.
sentence.Network_cn: 新搬来的人只是害羞地笑了一笑, 但是这就够了.
“ 你 说 得很对, " 赫斯渥惭愧地表示同意.

sentence.Network_en: Sometimes they laughed together shamefacedly and low.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们不时发出腼腆的,轻轻的笑声.

sentences.sentence: "quarrels and dissensions ensued among the cast, most of whom hurriedly and shamefacedly handed over their parts to understudies"
